issue.title: Filter on "status" deleted does not work
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I deleted a resource on the front-end and then I filtered on "status=deleted"... the deleted resource is not displayed (the list is empty).

Can someone try to reproduce it ?

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi,

Did someone reproduce it in previous stable versions or just in under development 4.2 version ?

Thanks

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I tested it again (with a brand new resource) on 4.3.0-rc-8 and the same behaviour occurs.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I am wondering what shoud be the right behaviour : after all, if the resource is deleted, it is normal not to see it any more. So maybe the behaviour is OK and the status "deleted" should not be available in the status filter list.

What do you think ?

_PS : we have the "archive" statuts if the resouce manager want to keep a resource in the system but tag it as "not any more used"_

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

After some thoughts, I suggest the following - and minor - change :

- remove from the status list the item "deleted"

Is it OK with the TC ?

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC validates the remove of status "deleted".

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

To be done... please.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Done in revision : 8899

Note: the strings were kept in translations files to maintain compatibility with the 4.2.x -> 4.3.1 versions
